articles.description: Rangers have been handed a potential £3.5m boost and the return of Kemar Roofe who could well be available for the Hibs revenge mission this week.
articles.content:
Rangers could be boosted by the return of top goalscorer Kemar Roofe to the squad to face Hibs at Easter Road in the Scottish Premiership, Giovanni van Bronckhorst has confirmed.
The Dutchman was fa… [+2697 chars]

articles.content:
West Ham are interested in signing Liverpool centre-back Nathaniel Phillips, according to reports.

articles.author: Max Winters
articles.title: PSG's Neymar is ruled out for six to eight weeks with ankle ligament damage - Daily Mail
articles.description: A statement from PSG on Monday afternoon confirmed a 'sprained left ankle with ligament injuries' will rule Neymar out for six to eight weeks in a big blow to Mauricio Pochettino.
articles.content:
Paris Saint-Germain have announced Neymar will miss six to eight weeks of action after he suffered ankle ligament damage during their win over Saint-Etienne on Sunday. 
Mauricio Pochettino's side be… [+2610 chars]
